name: Bite the Hand, Mass
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Pathfinder Society Field Guide. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: This spell functions like bite the hand, except as noted above. The target creatures do not need to have all been summoned by the same being.
target_zh: 借由法术或类法术能力召唤出的一名生物/每等级，任两者之间不得相距超过30呎。
text_zh: 这法术的运作方式跟吃里扒外相同，除了上面写的以外。目标生物并不需要皆由同一位存在所召唤出来。
